name: weekend-three-challenge
description: - [ ] create public file insert index.html, client.js, styles.css - [ ] create apps.js - [ ] create a module folder with tasks.js - [ ] create a routes folder with pool.js - [ ] sketch out html with two inputs and send button and connect all files - [ ] in client.js set up basic jquery and button listeners - [ ] create route POST to database - [ ] data appends to the DOM - [ ] create route GET - [ ] data removes from DOM and replaces with updated info - [ ] delete button, removes data from html and database - [ ] complete button, changes css color and checks off tasks - [ ] style it
